page.title: 20Features of Johnstonebridge
page.content:
There are no Ancient Monuments in Johnstonebridge but the track of a Roman road does go through the area . There was an ancient fort on one of the hill tops. The main feature of the area is the River Annan running South, with the A74, the railway, some minor roads,and the old Roman road all following the valley.
**************
All the articles in the above pages were written by the children of Johnstonebridge School assisted by Mrs.C. Henderson, Mrs.M. Rhind and Mrs.H. Todd.
###############
